org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.trainers.columnbased

Class CacheColumnDecisionTreeTrainerInput<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.trainers.columnbased.CacheColumnDecisionTreeTrainerInput<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - Class of keys of the cache.
    V - Class of values of the cache.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ColumnDecisionTreeTrainerInput
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BiIndexedCacheColumnDecisionTreeTrainerInput, MatrixColumnDecisionTreeTrainerInput

    public abstract class CacheColumnDecisionTreeTrainerInput<K,V>
extends Object
implements ColumnDecisionTreeTrainerInput
    Adapter of a given cache to CacheColumnDecisionTreeTrainerInput

    • Constructor Detail

      • CacheColumnDecisionTreeTrainerInput

        public CacheColumnDecisionTreeTrainerInput(IgniteCache<K,V> c,
                                           IgniteSupplier<Stream<K>> labelsKeys,
                                           IgniteFunction<javax.cache.Cache.Entry<K,V>,Stream<IgniteBiTuple<Integer,Double>>> valuesMapper,
                                           IgniteFunction<V,DoubleStream> labelsMapper,
                                           IgniteFunction<Integer,Stream<K>> keyMapper,
                                           Map<Integer,Integer> catFeaturesInfo,
                                           int featuresCnt,
                                           int samplesCnt)
        Constructs input for ColumnDecisionTreeTrainer.
        Parameters:
        c - Cache.
        valuesMapper - Function for mapping cache entry to stream used by ColumnDecisionTreeTrainer.
        labelsMapper - Function used for mapping cache value to labels array.
        keyMapper - Function used for mapping feature index to the cache key.
        catFeaturesInfo - Information about which features are categorical in form of feature index -> number of categories.
        featuresCnt - Count of features.
        samplesCnt - Count of samples.
